column4: Hi all! Has anyone tried this hardware config and what kernel would be right for the badger install? Gigabyte GA-K8NMF-9 nForce4/AMD Athlon64 X2 Dual-Core "Manchester"/GeForce 7800GT
if your downloading an iso make sure its the 64 bit version, aside from that you look ready to roll
maybe you can help? do you know the name of the command that is behind the "close all windows and show desktop"?
i wouldnt know but tell you what,. you just tickled my fancy,. i ll see if i can find out
